message: My turn. This offer is a bit better for me, considering the inflation.
Considering inflation, this is a fair deal now.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This offer benefits us both considering how quickly the value is dropping.
I'm trying to meet you halfway, Bob. Don't let the money lose more value!
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest option. Take it before the money is worth even less.
